member.name: T:DG.DeInspektorEditor.DeInspektor
member.summary: Used to draw special method attributes. If you need another generic inspector, inherit from this and override DoEnable, DoDisable and OnInspectorGUI.

member.name: M:DG.DeInspektorEditor.DeInspektor.InjectGUITop
member.summary: Can be used to inject GUI elements before any other default GUI calls.

member.name: M:DG.DeInspektorEditor.DeInspektor.DrawReorderingButtons
member.summary: Draws buttons to reorder the component on its header

member.name: T:DG.DeInspektorEditor.DeInspektorForScriptableObject
member.summary: Inherits from DeInspektor to allow everything to work on ScriptableObjects too
